text: It s been six years since I got diagnosed with depression and I feel like giving upHello  I m just so lost and don t know who to turn to and this is one place I ve never tried so I thought I d post here just in case I feel like such a burden to the people around me and I just wonder if choosing to keep living is even the right thing to do  I ve been struggling along for a long time  Over and over I ve tried to do the right thing and keep going   reach out to friends  call hotlines  see a doctor  go to a mental health safety house  go to A amp E  the list goes on and on  but I always find myself back at rock bottom one way or another  This year when I tried to get help for my mental health problems again  the nurse who I saw got angry with me while I was having a breakdown and accused me of trying to emotionally blackmail her when I mentioned needing help because I was suicidal  I left in tears and a stranger on the street had to give me a hug and talk to me for a while I ve mostly been kept going by a group of supportive friends but recently there was drama in the friend group and I ve found myself drifting away from everyone  It s like the last little light in my life has gone out  I don t know why I m carrying on any more  I only have one friend left who I can turn to but after needing her support over and over again  I feel like I m just bringing her down and holding her back All this time I felt like it was my duty to keep going  keep trying  I ve asked for help over and over  pushed through for the sake of the people who care about me  But I feel like everyone would be better off without me  I just bring people down time and time again and I can t even bring myself to ask for help any more I don t know what I need to hear but if anyone has any kind words I would really appreciate it  I feel so alone right now and it s so hard to keep going
summary: It's been six years since I got diagnosed with depression and I feel like giving up. Recently there was a drama in the friend group and I've found myself drifting away from everyone. I don't know why I'm carrying on any more.

text: I think I m doneIt s been a week and I just can t do it anymore  I m tired of the pain  the betrayal  how people look at me now  the panic attacks  being a burden on people  and being shuffled around  I m just not strong enough  I ve been to therapists all week and they seemed so hopeful for us  I believed them  And it hurt because every decision this week hurt me  I can t handle the compounding despair  There is a path to getting better but I don t want it  I m not strong enough to go through everything again  I was so much happier a week ago  I forgave the ultimate betrayal but they weren t even willing to give me some time to heal and a chance to be a better person  Thank you for listening
summary: It's been a week and she's been to therapists all week. She was happier a week ago. She forgave the betrayal but they weren't willing to give her some time to heal. She's not strong enough to go through everything again.
cleaned: week therapist week happy week ago forgave betrayal not willing time heal not strong
